channel.title: Announcement on Another music theory blog
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on Another music theory blog

item.title: El ABC de la Teoría Musical Volume 1
item.description:
Download here the Second edition of this book, with little fixes and new lessons adapted to a modern language and context.

CC 4.0 N.C

item.title: El ABC de la Teoría Musical Volume 2
item.description:
Download here the Second edition of this book’s 2nd volume, with lessons that deserved its own little space.

CC 4.0 N.C

item.title: Music Theory exercises 1 & 2
item.description:
This book is made of exercises designed specifically to measure the level of knoweledge aquired by the first and second volume of “El ABC de la teoría musical”

CC 4.0 N.C

item.title: De Obras Bolivianas 1º Edition
item.description:
This is the first edition of this recopilation, it contains some arrangements and transcriptions of original sheets for piano. In total 12 music pieces. For interested people.

CC 4.0 N.C
